subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Offensive tackle Michael Roos agreed to a contract with the Tennessee Titans that guarantees him $15 million. The total value of the deal is $43 million if he completes the contract’s six-year term, which makes Roos the third-highest-paid left tackle in the N.F.L. behind Orlando Pace and Walter Jones.
